name: Red Radish Robotics
description:
On the seventh floor of HQ, the professor rushed into the games room as people yelled and slammed doors in the corridor outside. He hugged you to sleep. That is your last memory.

You wake to discover that something terrible must have occurred.

In the event of an emergency, your mission is to search the rooms, rescue your colleagues, and then meet the professor outside. But something seems different tonight.

Red Radish Robotics is a choice-based work of interactive fiction, combining a dystopian sci-fi short story with an escape game.

Red Radish Robotics finished 19th out of 103 entries in its debut @ IFComp2020. 

For social media links and more information on Gibbo Gamebooks / Gibbo Creations, please visit: https://www.gibbocreations.com/

Walkthrough: https://www.gibbocreations.com/gibbo-gamebooks
